org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core
Class Source.ReaderAndReadPoints

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.Source.ReaderAndReadPoints
Enclosing class:
Source
public class Source.ReaderAndReadPoints
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a reader (HardwareAbstraction) and all of its read points (ReadPoint) It is used to simplify read and write calls.

Author:
Markus Vitalini

getAllReadPoints

public final java.util.Hashtable getAllReadPoints()
Get all readpoints.

Returns:
Returns a Vector of readpoints. The elements are of type String and contain the id of the readpoint.

getAllReadPointsAsArray

public final java.lang.String[] getAllReadPointsAsArray()
Get all readpoints as array of String.

Returns:
Returns a String array with the ids of the readpoints
